DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person._The likelihood or possibility that a specific state or condition will exist or that an action will occur._The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person.
